price: Sungguh, "sebenarnya keterangan-keterangan-Ku telah datang kepadamu, tetapi kamu mendustakannya, malah kamu menyombongkan diri dan termasuk orang kafir."
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: balā qad jāatka āyātī fakadhabta bihā wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kāfirīna
